name: Spritz
description: Italian wine-based cocktail, commonly served as an aperitif in Northeast Italy.

name: Espresso Martini
description: Cold, coffee-flavored cocktail made with vodka, espresso coffee, coffee liqueur, and sugar syrup.

name: Margarita
description: Tequila, orange liqueur, and lime juice often served with salt on the rim of the glass.

name: Moscow Mule
description: Made with vodka, spicy ginger beer, and lime juice, garnished with a slice or wedge of lime and mint leaves.

name: Mojito
description: Its combination of sweetness, citrus, and mint flavors is intended to complement the rum, and has made the mojito a popular summer drink.
